output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows the owner to increase the balance of an arbitrary user, which can lead to a drastic decrease in token value due to oversaturation.
The buy function has an integer overflow vulnerability where the amount variable can be manipulated to a very large value, allowing users to buy an uncontrolled amount of tokens.
The sell function has an integer overflow vulnerability where the amount variable can be manipulated to a very large value, allowing the contract owner to drain the contract of funds.
